jobDescription: Candidatul Ideal The ideal candidate will have a strong background in designing, implementing, and maintaining automated testing solutions to ensure the highest ︇︊︅︊︊︍︉︊​︅︎︄︂​︁︁︎︎​︉︄︌︉​︀︎︌︍︌︆︉︀︆️︉︌quality of our B2B marketplace platform.  Requirements: At least 4 years experience as a QA Automation Developer and Tester, preferably in a B2B marketplace environment. Proficiency in automation tools (Selenium, Appium, JUnit, TestNG). Strong programming skills in Python, JavaScript, or other relevant languages. Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, Bamboo, Travis CI). Familiarity with API testing tools (Postman, RestAssured, SoapUI). Experience with performance testing tools (JMeter, LoadRunner). Good level of English, native Romanian. BA in Computer Science. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.  Nice to have: Relevant certifications that demonstrate a commitment to the field and knowledge of advanced concepts. Descrierea jobului Responsabilities: Design and develop automated test scripts using tools such as Selenium, Appium and Unittest. Conduct performance and security testing. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define test strategies and ensure comprehensive test coverage. Analyze test results, identify defects, and provide detailed reports to stakeholders. Maintain and update test automation frameworks to improve efficiency and reliability.  Benefits: Attractive salary package that reflects the responsibilities. You will learn new technologies and you will be involved in activities with different degrees of complexity. A flexible, multicultural, results-oriented environment, specific to an innovative company. You will be part of a team of professionals passionate both on the business side and on the technical side. Descrierea companiei Supreva is a B2B marketplace that empowers thousands of retail entrepreneurs in Romania, Hungary, Bulgaria and Poland to access the best-fitted suppliers to stock their stores risk free, grow their businesses and become more efficient.  Our goal is to become one of the largest e-commerce project in Europe, based on Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning.
